logicTypes.description: Current power being received. Measured in watts.
Whether the device is open or closed. 1 for open, 0 for closed.
Current operating mode. 0 for cooling mode (removes heat from input gas), 1 for heating mode (adds heat to input gas).
Whether the device is in an error state. 1 for error, 0 for normal operation.
Whether the device is locked. 1 for locked, 0 for unlocked.
Horizontal viewing angle of the device.
Vertical viewing angle of the device.
Whether the device is turned on. 1 for on, 0 for off.
Target temperature for the air conditioner. Measured in Kelvin.
Current power required for the device to operate. Measured in watts.
Current temperature of the device. Measured in Kelvin.
Temperature of the gas entering the air conditioner from the input pipe. Measured in Kelvin.
Temperature of the gas exiting the air conditioner to the output pipe. Measured in Kelvin.
Temperature of the external atmosphere surrounding the device. Measured in Kelvin.
Pressure of the gas entering the air conditioner from the input pipe. Measured in kilopascals.
Pressure of the gas exiting the air conditioner to the output pipe. Measured in kilopascals.
Ratio of oxygen in the device's internal atmosphere.
Ratio of carbon dioxide in the device's internal atmosphere.
Ratio of nitrogen in the device's internal atmosphere.
Ratio of pollutant (Volatiles) in the device's internal atmosphere.
Ratio of volatiles in the device's internal atmosphere.
Ratio of water vapor (steam) in the device's internal atmosphere.

Ratio of polluted water vapor in the device's internal atmosphere.
Ratio of steam (H2O gas) in the device's internal atmosphere.
Ratio of liquid nitrogen in the device's internal atmosphere.

Ratio of volatiles in the gas entering from the input pipe.

Ratio of hydrogen in the gas entering from the input pipe.
